Topic Summary: Appellant claiming exemption due to operating as an undisclosed Agent
Tax Legislation: Section 3, Value-Added Tax Consolidation Act (“VATCA 2010”); section 25 (1) VATCA 2010; section 28 (1) VATCA 2010; section 46 VATCA 2010; Schedule 1 VATCA 2010 – Paragraph 4 (3); Sixth Vat Directive – Article 13A (2).
